price: Wͻbεbrε wͻn nne ase akasa akyerε wͻn ho sε: “Motenaa (wiase) bεyε dadu bi “.
arabic: يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا عَشۡرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yatakhāfatūna baynahum in labith'tum illā ʿashran
